Unemployment Rate - Construction Industry, Private Wage and Salary
Construction employees in the construction sector include: Working
supervisors, qualified craft workers, mechanics, apprentices, helpers,
laborers, and so forth, engaged in new work, alterations, demolition,
repair, maintenance, and the like, whether working at the site of
construction or in shops or yards at jobs (such as precutting and
preassembling) ordinarily performed by members of the construction
